title: Suthi Suthi Vantheega Song Lyrics Padayappa
stanzas:
Suthi Suthi Vantheega Song Lyrics Padayappa
#ARRahman #SPB

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
ayyo en naanam aththu poga

kannaal yedhayo paatheega
kaayaa pazhamaa kaetteega
ennoda aavi iththu poga

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
muththaadum aasa
muththi poga

eththana ponnunga vanthaanga
enna iduppula soruga paathaaga
munthaanaiyil neengathaan
mudinjeega

pombala usuru
poga poga noaga
indhira maganae
indha tholla vazhga

adi kadhal thaerthalil
kattil chinnathil vettri petru
nee vazhga.

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
ayyo en naanam aththu poga

kannaal yedhayo paatheega
kaayaa pazhamaa kaetteega
ennoda aavi iththu poga

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
muththaadum aasa
muththi poga

en kadhu kadhu kadikkum
pallukku kaayam kodukkum
kaayam kodukkum
valavikku maarbu midhikkum
maarbu midhikkum
kaalukku muththam tharuven

en usura kudikkum
usura kudikkum udhattukku
manasu kedukkum
manasa kedukkum kannukku
kannam keeram
kannam keerum nagathukku
muththam iduven

adi thummum pozhudhilum
immi azhavilum piriyaadheega
umma thaeva theernthadhum
porvai pothiye urangaatheega

ini kan thoongalaam
kaiga thoongaathuga
oru thaaiyikku munnaal
thaalaatu vaikaatheega

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
muththaadum aasa
muththi poga

eththana ponnunga vanthaanga
enna iduppula soruga paathaaga
munthaanaiyil neengathaan
mudinjeega

pombala usuru
poga poga noaga
aambala kodukkum
anbu tholla vazhga

adi kadhal thaerthalil
kattil chinnathil vettri petru
nee vazhga.

naan thazhuvum podhu
thazhuvum podhu nazhuvuren
thayiru pola
thayiru pola uraiyiren
kayiru mela
kayira pottu
ayyo kadaiyureega

naan mayangi mayangi
mayangi mayangi kirangavum
mayakkam thelinji
mayakkam thelinji ezhumbavum
oththa poovil netthi pottil
ayyo adikkureega

uchci veyilula
kuchchi ice-a pol
urugaatheega

thanni panthale
thaagam edukkayil
eriyaatheega

ella thaandaatheega
enna thoondaatheega
en vaayodu vaai vaikka
vakkeelu vaikkaatheega

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
ayyo en naanam aththu poga

kannaal yedhayo paatheega
kaayaa pazhamaa kaetteega
ennoda aavi iththu poga

pombala usuru
poga poga noaga
aambala kodukkum
anbu tholla vazhga

adi kadhal thaerthalil
kattil chinnathil vettri petru
nee vazhga.

Suthi suthi vandheenga
suttum vizhiyaal sutteega
muththaadum aasa
muththi poga

eththana ponnunga vanthaanga
enna iduppula soruga paathaaga
munthaanaiyil neengathaan
mudinjeega
